scripts.build: wp-scripts build --webpack-copy-php=false --config packages/client/webpack.config.js && tsc --project packages/client --emitDeclarationOnly --outDir packages/client/build-types
scripts.lint:php: wp-env run tests-cli --env-cwd=wp-content/plugins/$(basename "$(pwd)")/ composer run-script lint
scripts.lint:php:fix: wp-env run tests-cli --env-cwd=wp-content/plugins/$(basename "$(pwd)")/ composer run-script format
scripts.lint:php:stan: wp-env run tests-cli --env-cwd=wp-content/plugins/$(basename "$(pwd)")/ composer run-script phpstan
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:php && npm run lint:js && npm run typecheck
scripts.test:all: npm run test:php && npm run test:client
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build
